local function WaitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do print(parent, child) wait() end return parent[child] end
local Player local Character local Torso local Humanoid
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local LastAttack = 0
local FireWeld = WaitForChild(Tool, 'FireWeld') local FirePart = WaitForChild(Sword, 'FirePart') local SoulFire = WaitForChild(FirePart, 'Fire')
SoulFire.Size = 2.5
local RunService = Game:GetService('RunService') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local Lunging = false
local TrailPart = Instance.new('Part') TrailPart.FormFactor = 3 TrailPart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) TrailPart.Anchored = true TrailPart.CanCollide = false TrailPart.Transparency = 1.0
local Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Fire.Name = 'TrailFire' Fire.Heat = 25 Fire.Size = 4 Fire.Parent = TrailPart
local EffectPart = Instance.new('Part') EffectPart.FormFactor =3 EffectPart.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) EffectPart.Name = 'WingCutter'
-- TODO: Add the mesh and texture IDs local EffectMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') EffectMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) EffectMesh.Parent = EffectPart
local EffectFire = Instance.new('Fire') EffectFire.Heat = 25 EffectFire.Size = 5.0 EffectFire.Parent = EffectPart
local SwordDamage = 25
Tool.Enabled = true
local TrailDamage = 5 -- move to separate script perhaps?
local PurgeValue local ConsumeValue
local SoulMark = Instance.new('BoolValue') SoulMark.Name = 'SoulMark'
local Equipped = false
local SoulStealerValue
local Souls
local function blow(hitPart, damage, part) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent then local humanoid = hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitPart.Parent:IsA('Hat') and hitPart.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hitPart.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end if humanoid and Humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then if humanoid.Health - SwordDamage < 20 and SoulFire.Enabled and not humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('DecimateScript') then local dScript = script.DecimateScript:Clone() local tValue = WaitForChild(dScript, 'Torso') tValue.Value = Torso dScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent dScript.Disabled = false else humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) Humanoid:TakeDamage(-damage/10) end if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') then -- SLOW THEM DOWN, add a mark local mark = SoulMark:Clone() mark.Parent = humanoid.Parent DebrisService:AddItem(mark, 5.75)
Spawn(function() humanoid.WalkSpeed = 9.0 wait(1.25) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end) end end end end
local function Lunge()
Lunging = true
local target = Humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) local newBV = nil
Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.3, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)
if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = Torso Torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, Torso.Position.Y, 0)) end Spawn(function() while Lunging do local hPart = Sword:Clone() hPart.Transparency = 0.5 hPart.Anchored = true
hPart.Parent = Game.Workspace
hPart.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) blow(hitPart, 5.0, hPart) end)
DebrisService:AddItem(hPart, 1)
wait(0.08) end end) wait(0.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:Destroy() end Lunging = false Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.3, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) wait(0.5) end
local function Attack() -- do stuff here Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.29999995, 0, 0, 1, -0, 0, -0, -1, -1, 0, -0) local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool Spawn(function() local count = 3 while count > 0 do local hPart = Sword:Clone() hPart.Transparency = 0.5 hPart.Anchored = true
hPart.Parent = Game.Workspace
DebrisService:AddItem(hPart, 0.35) count = count - 1 wait(0.06) end end) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.3, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)
end
local function OnActivated() if not Humanoid or not Torso then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
print(timestep, LastAttack) local timestep = RunService.Stepped:wait() if (timestep - LastAttack < 0.2) then Lunge() else Attack() end
LastAttack = timestep
Tool.Enabled = true end
local function SetPlayerMaxHealth(value) local ratio = Humanoid.Health/Humanoid.MaxHealth
Humanoid.MaxHealth = value
while Humanoid.Health < ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth do Humanoid.Health = ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth wait() end end
local function Encompass() local SoulColors = { Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(1, 0.2, 0), Color3.new(0.8, 0.2, 0), Color3.new(1, 0, 0.2), Color3.new(0.8, 0.4, 0) } Souls:ClearAllChildren() if SoulStealerValue then for i = 1, SoulStealerValue.Value do local cPart = Instance.new('Part') cPart.FormFactor = 3 cPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) cPart.Transparency = 1.0 cPart.Anchored = true
local cFire = SoulFire:Clone() cFire.Parent = cPart cFire.Enabled = true cFire.Size = 1 cFire.Color = SoulColors[math.random(1, #SoulColors)]
cPart.Parent = Souls
DebrisService:AddItem(cPart, 45.0)
Spawn(function() while cPart and cPart.Parent do for i = 1, 30 do cPart.CFrame = (Torso.CFrame + CFrame.Angles(0, 2 * i * math.pi/30, 0) * Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0) wait() end end end)
wait(0.75) end end end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso') Humanoid = WaitForChild(Character, 'Humanoid')
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 18.0
Equipped = true
SetPlayerMaxHealth(135)
-- Provides increased regeneration Spawn(function() while Equipped do if Humanoid.Health < Humanoid.MaxHealth then Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.Health + 0.25 end wait(1.0) end end)
if FireWeld then FireWeld.Parent = Sword end
if not Character:FindFirstChild('SoulStealer') then SoulStealerValue = Instance.new('IntValue') SoulStealerValue.Name = 'SoulStealer' SoulStealerValue.Parent = Character
SoulStealerValue.Changed:connect(Encompass) end
if not Character:FindFirstChild('Souls') then Souls = Instance.new('Model') Souls.Name = 'Souls' Souls.Parent = Character end end
local function OnUnequipped() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.3, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) Equipped = false SetPlayerMaxHealth(100) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Sword.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) blow(hitPart, SwordDamage) end)
ConsumeValue = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Consume') PurgeValue = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Purge') DecimateValue = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Decimate')
local function ConsumeTarget(character, torso, num) local cPart = Instance.new('Part') cPart.FormFactor = 3 cPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) cPart.Transparency = 1.0
local cFire = SoulFire:Clone() cFire.Parent = cPart cFire.Enabled = true cFire.Size = 1
if num and num < 3 then num = 3 end
if character and torso then num = num or 4 for i = 1, num do local fPart = cPart:Clone() fPart.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 4.0 local rPropulsion = Instance.new('RocketPropulsion') rPropulsion.Target = torso rPropulsion.TargetOffset = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
rPropulsion.Thrust = 50000 rPropulsion.ThrustP = 500 rPropulsion.ThrustD = 5
rPropulsion.MaxSpeed = 75
rPropulsion.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(4e6, 4e6, 0)
rPropulsion.Parent = fPart fPart.Parent = Game.Workspace
rPropulsion:Fire()
rPropulsion.ReachedTarget:connect(function() if torso then local dScript = script.DecimateScript:Clone() WaitForChild(dScript, 'Torso').Value = Torso dScript.Parent = character dScript.Disabled = false
if fPart then fPart:Destroy() end end end)
DebrisService:AddItem(fPart, 5.5) wait(0.25) end else -- no target just shoot ahead for i = 1, 5 do local fPart = cPart:Clone()
local bFloat = Instance.new('BodyForce') bFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, fPart:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) bFloat.Parent = fPart
fPart.Velocity = (Humanoid.TargetPoint - Torso.Position).unit * 75.0
fPart.Parent = Game.Workspace
fPart.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent then if hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then local dScript = script.DecimateScript:Clone() WaitForChild(dScript, 'Torso').Value = Torso dScript.Parent = hitPart.Parent dScript.Disabled = false
if fPart then fPart:Destroy() end end end end)
DebrisService:AddItem(fPart, 5.5) end end end
ConsumeValue.Changed:connect(function() if ConsumeValue and ConsumeValue.Value == true then local max = 0 local markList = {} local markedCharacter = nil
local players = Game.Players:GetPlayers() for _, player in pairs(players) do if player and player ~= Player and player.Character and player.Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') then local character = player.Character local torso = character.Torso local distance = (Torso.Position - torso.Position).magnitude if distance < 150 then local cChildren = character:GetChildren() markList[character] = 0 for i = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[i].Name == 'SoulMark' and cChildren[i]:IsA('BoolValue') then markList[character] = markList[character] + 1 if markList[character] > max then max = markList[character] markedCharacter = character end end end end end end
if markedCharacter then ConsumeTarget(markedCharacter, markedCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso'), max) else -- shoot 5 fire objects straight ahead instead ConsumeTarget() end
wait(20.0) ConsumeValue.Value = false end end)
PurgeValue.Changed:connect(function() if PurgeValue and PurgeValue.Value == true then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 wait(1.25) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 18.0 local sChildren = Souls:GetChildren() if #sChildren == 0 then PurgeValue.Value = false return end for i = 1, #sChildren do local pillar = Instance.new('Part') pillar.FormFactor = 3 pillar.Size = Vector3.new(6, 33, 6) pillar.CanCollide = false pillar.Transparency = 1.0
local cFire = SoulFire:Clone() cFire.Enabled = true cFire.Size = 25 cFire.Heat = 25 cFire.Parent = pillar
local pFloat = Instance.new('BodyForce') pFloat.Name = 'Float' pFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, pillar:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) pFloat.Parent = pillar
pillar.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.Position + Vector3.new(0, -3, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(0, 2 * i * math.pi/#sChildren, 0)
pillar.Velocity = pillar.CFrame.lookVector * 75.0
local originPos = pillar.Position pillar.Parent = Game.Workspace
pillar.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent and hitPart.Parent ~= Character then local humanoid = hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then local torso = humanoid.Parent.Torso local distance = (originPos - torso.Position).magnitude humanoid:TakeDamage(77/(distance%10)) end end end)
DebrisService:AddItem(pillar, 5.0) end SoulStealerValue.Value = 0 wait(42.0) PurgeValue.Value = false end end)
DecimateValue.Changed:connect(function() if DecimateValue and DecimateValue.Value == true then if SoulFire then SoulFire.Enabled = true SoulFire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) end wait(18.0) SoulFire.Enabled = false DecimateValue.Value = false end end)

local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local bodyVelocity
local FirePart = Instance.new("Part") FirePart.FormFactor = 3 FirePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) FirePart.Transparency = 1.0 FirePart.Name = "FirePart" FirePart.CanCollide = false
local DebrisService = game:GetService("Debris")
local SoulFire = Instance.new("Fire") SoulFire.Parent = FirePart SoulFire.Color = Color3.new(255/255, 0, 0) SoulFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 255/255, 153/255) SoulFire.Heat = 25 SoulFire.Size = 6
local TargetTorso = script:FindFirstChild("Torso") while TargetTorso == nil do TargetTorso = script:FindFirstChild("Torso") wait() end
local StoreHealth = 0 local StoreCFrame
local FireWeld
local cChildren = Character:GetChildren() for i = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[i].className == "Tool" then cChildren[i]:Destroy() end end
if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 end
if Torso then bodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bodyVelocity.P = 300000 bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P) bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) bodyVelocity.Parent = Torso
FirePart.Parent = game.Workspace
FireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") FireWeld.Name = "FireWeld" FireWeld.Part0 = Torso FireWeld.Part1 = FirePart FireWeld.Parent = Torso end
wait(2.75) if Humanoid then StoreHealth = Humanoid.Health StoreCFrame = Torso.CFrame Humanoid.Health = 0 end if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity:Destroy() end
wait(1.0)
function follow(TargetTorso) while TargetTorso and FirePart do local distance = (TargetTorso.Position - FirePart.Position).magnitude if distance > 2 then if FirePart then FirePart.Velocity = (TargetTorso.Position - FirePart.Position).unit * 55.0 end end wait() end end
if TargetTorso and TargetTorso.Value then TargetTorso = TargetTorso.Value Spawn(function() wait(3.0) if TargetTorso and TargetTorso.Parent and TargetTorso.Parent and TargetTorso.Parent:FindFirstChild('SoulStealer') then print('Decimating - ', TargetTorso.Parent.SoulStealer.Value) TargetTorso.Parent.SoulStealer.Value = math.min(TargetTorso.Parent.SoulStealer.Value + 1, 5) end end)
if FireWeld then FireWeld:Destroy() end
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, FirePart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) bodyForce.Parent = FirePart
FirePart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) FirePart.CFrame = StoreCFrame
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() follow(TargetTorso) end))
DebrisService:AddItem(FirePart, 6)
FirePart.Touched:connect(function(hit) if FirePart and hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and hit.Parent.Torso == TargetTorso then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and FirePart then if FirePart then FirePart:Destroy() FirePart = nil end if (humanoid.Health + StoreHealth + 10) < humanoid.MaxHealth then humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + StoreHealth + 10 else humanoid.Health = humanoid.MaxHealth end end end end) else if FirePart then FirePart:Destroy() end if FireWeld then FireWeld:Destroy() end end
wait(6.0) script:Destroy()

local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while parent:FindFirstChild(childName) == nil do wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Player = Game.Players.LocalPlayer local Character local Torso local Humanoid
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local PurgeAnim local ConsumeAnim
local PurgeSound local ConsumeSound
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local Gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui')
local RbxGui = LoadLibrary('RbxGui')
local function CreateHelpText() if Gui.Parent then return end Gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') Gui.Parent = WaitForChild(Player, 'PlayerGui')
local sText = Instance.new('TextLabel') sText.Parent = Gui sText.Text = "You need souls to unleash the soul blast. Click Q to equip your sword with soul fire and frag enemies to collect upto 5 souls and unleash soul blast." sText.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 sText.Font = Enum.Font.ArialBold sText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 sText.Size = UDim2.new(0, 500, 0, 100) sText.TextWrapped = true sText.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -200, 0, -100) sText.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) sText.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) sText.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.5
sText:TweenPosition(UDim2.new(0.5, -250, 0, 70), 1, 1, 1, true)
wait(7.5) Gui:ClearAllChildren() Gui.Parent = nil end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso') Humanoid = WaitForChild(Character, 'Humanoid')
PurgeSound = WaitForChild(Sword, 'PurgeSound') ConsumeSound = WaitForChild(Sword, 'ConsumeSound') if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(function (key) key = key:lower() if key == 'e' then local soulConsume = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Consume') if soulConsume.Value == false then ConsumeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ConsumeAnim) --ConsumeAnim:Play() if ConsumeSound then ConsumeSound:Play() end soulConsume.Value = true end return elseif key == 'x' then local purge = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Purge') if purge.Value == false then local souls = Character:FindFirstChild('Souls') if souls and #souls:GetChildren() == 0 then Spawn(function() CreateHelpText() end) return end PurgeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.PurgeAnim) PurgeAnim:Play() if PurgeSound then PurgeSound:Play() end purge.Value = true end elseif key == 'q' then local decimate = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Decimate') if decimate.Value == false then decimate.Value = true end end end) end end
local function OnUnequipped() if PurgeAnim then PurgeAnim:Stop() end if ConsumeAnim then ConsumeAnim:Stop() end
if PurgeSound then PurgeSound:Stop() end if ConsumeSound then ConsumeSound:Stop() end
if Gui then Gui.Parent = nil end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
